title: Interactive 3D cafe website with contour-line theme, animations, core pages, and export/download page

requirements.text: Create a mobile-friendly interactive 3D cafe room experience on the Home page using Three.js (React Three Fiber), allowing users to explore/navigate the interior with simple controls that work on phone and tablet (e.g., drag to look, pinch/scroll to zoom, and an easy-to-use on-screen navigation option).

quotes: Make a 3d room type website for cafe very interative
Interior cafe space users can navigate but easy to navigate on phone or tablet too
All of the above but make it easy to navigate

acceptanceCriteria: Home page renders an interactive 3D scene representing a cafe interior (room + a few recognizable props like tables/chairs/counter).
Controls are usable on mobile/tablet (touch gestures supported) and on desktop (mouse supported).
Scene performance is acceptable on mid-range mobile devices (no obvious jank during basic navigation).
User can reset view/position via a clearly visible UI control.

requirements.text: Apply a consistent contour-line visual theme across the entire site, including a coherent color palette (non-blue/purple by default) and typography, and ensure the theme is used consistently in layout, backgrounds, and UI elements.

quotes: make theme contour lines and good colors

acceptanceCriteria: All pages share a consistent contour-line themed look and feel (background pattern and/or section styling).
A single cohesive color palette is applied consistently across navigation, buttons, headings, and backgrounds.
Typography is consistent across pages (headings/body) and remains readable over the contour-line visuals.

requirements.text: Add smooth, sitewide animations that enhance interactivity while keeping navigation easy (e.g., page transitions, hover/tap micro-interactions, subtle parallax/ambient motion, and gentle 3D scene ambient animation).
acceptanceCriteria: Primary UI elements (nav links, buttons, cards/sections) have subtle hover/tap animations.
Page navigation includes a smooth transition (non-blocking, maintains usability).
3D scene includes at least one ambient animation (e.g., subtle light movement, steam effect, or gentle object motion) that does not hinder controls.

requirements.text: Implement core site pages with placeholder content in English: Home (3D room), Menu, About Us, and Contact Us; include a persistent navigation header and a mobile-friendly menu.

quotes: add menu page about us page and contact us page
No, use placeholder content for now
Use English for any user-facing text in the build request.

acceptanceCriteria: Routes/pages exist for Home, Menu, About Us, and Contact Us.
Menu page shows placeholder menu sections/items (e.g., coffee, tea, pastries) with prices and short descriptions (placeholders).
About Us page contains placeholder narrative content and a small set of highlight bullets (placeholders).
Contact Us page shows placeholder contact details and includes a contact form UI (name/email/message) with a non-sending placeholder submit behavior (e.g., local success toast/message).
Navigation works on desktop and mobile (collapsible mobile menu).

requirements.text: Add an Export/Download page that provides a downloadable package of the website intended for later WordPress import/editing; include clear on-page instructions (in English) describing what the download contains and general steps the user can take to use it with WordPress/Elementor.

quotes: add a extra page where I can download this website as is and import in wordpress and edit using elementor

acceptanceCriteria: An Export/Download page exists and is accessible from the main navigation.
Page includes a prominent download control that downloads a single archive file (e.g., .zip) from static assets.
Page includes clearly written instructions stating that this is a static export package and outlining general next steps for WordPress/Elementor usage.
All user-facing text on this page is in English.

requirements.text: Add minimal backend support (Motoko, single actor) only if needed for the Export/Download workflow (e.g., returning metadata/version info); otherwise keep the app frontend-only for content and interactions.

quotes: add a extra page where I can download this website as is

acceptanceCriteria: If backend endpoints are added, they are contained within the single main actor and are limited to non-essential metadata (no complex state).
Core site (Home/Menu/About/Contact/Export) functions end-to-end without requiring user authentication.

requirements.text: Add a lightweight, accessible layout system that keeps content readable over the contour-line theme (contrast, spacing, responsive breakpoints), including a footer with placeholder business details and links to core pages.
acceptanceCriteria: Text contrast meets basic accessibility expectations against backgrounds.
Layout is responsive (mobile/tablet/desktop) with sensible spacing and typography scaling.
Footer appears on all pages with placeholder address/hours and links to Menu/About/Contact/Export.

constraints: Use React + TypeScript with Tailwind, shadcn UI components, and React Query as applicable.
Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths provided by the platform; compose those components instead.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (no additional backend services).
No third-party authentication providers; only Internet Identity is supported (but not required for this build).
Use placeholder content where real cafe details are not provided, and keep user-facing text in English.
nonGoals: Implementing an actual WordPress plugin, direct Elementor API integration, or one-click automatic import into WordPress.
Building a full CMS/admin editor inside this app.
Adding payments, reservations, real-time chat, or external database integrations.

required: Seamless contour-line pattern background, subtle and low-contrast (contour-pattern.dim_2048x2048.png)
Hero background illustration combining cafe ambiance with contour-line aesthetic (cafe-hero-contour.dim_1920x1080.png)
